Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small MoufangLoop AllSmallMoufangLoop is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic MoufangLoop of orders 2 to 15.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallMoufangLoop">
The output moufangloop are represented by its operation table for +, *, ^, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small MoufangLoop
"IsASmallMoufangLoop" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic MoufangLoop of orders 2 to 15. It returns true if the model is a Small MoufangLoop, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallMoufangLoop">
